name: Life Cyan
description:
<>




Controls:

  • Movement: WASD QEZC
  • Skip turn: Space
  • Peek around corners: P
  • Observe guards: O
  • Exit level: >
  • Hide walls: T
  • Pan camera: arrow keys

Credits:

  • Design: Andrew Kay & co.
  • Programming: Andrew Kay, Cyberboy2000, Mobbstar, Sizzlefrost
  • Art: Hekateras, Sizzlefrost
  • Writing: Hekateras, SpecialC
  • Music and sound: Neverpure20
